title: Gerritsen Beach Library
address: 2808 Gerritsen Ave. Brooklyn, NY 11229
closingmsg: Please note: Gerritsen Beach Library is closed for building maintenance. The branch will reopen on Wednesday, November 12, 2025 at 10 am. Library staff is available for outreach services every Monday and Wednesday from 11 am - 4 pm, in front of Gerritsen Beach Library, until the branch reopens. BPL’s Bookmobile will park in front of Gerritsen Beach Library on the below dates:October 15, 20, 27: 11 am -4 pmNovember 3, 12: 11 am - 4 pm Interim Service During ConstructionStaff at Gerritsen Beach Library are hosting programs around our community during construction. Find out about library programs. In addition to the weekly programs, library patrons can also: Request the BookMobile to attend special events (priority is given to neighborhoods without regular library service)Attend virtual programs or use the library's online resourcesOlder adults who are homebound can receive Books by Mail
tags: printing pickup;computer reservations;closed for renovation;  open saturdays;

title: Gravesend Library
address: 303 Ave. X at West. 2nd St. Brooklyn, NY 11223
closingmsg: Infrastructure Upgrades at Gravesend LibraryOn March 10, 2025, the Gravesend Library temporarily closed while the New York City Department of Design and Construction (DDC) launches a project to address longstanding flooding and outdated infrastructure issues at Gravesend Library. The scope includes facade work, window replacement, and other sitework around the branch to prevent water accumulation and infiltration. In addition to this DDC project, BPL will replace the decades-old rooftop heating and cooling units.Please note that the external book return will be unavailable as of March 8, 2025.  Remaining holds not picked up March 8, 2025, will be available at the Homecrest Library after March 17, 2025.  The Bookmobile will be available 11 AM to 4 PM weekly on Wednesdays March 12, 19, 26, then on the 1st Wednesday of every month beginning April 2, 2025, 11 AM to 4 PM. Please visit our location map for a list of nearby locations to visit and place holds.
tags: after-hours returns;outdoor services;computer reservations;closed for renovation; 24hr book drop; open saturdays;
